name: Obsidian
description: Local filesystem integration for Obsidian vaults â€” search, read, create, and list Markdown notes.
author: Reins

operations.name: search-notes
operations.description: Search notes by content and title in the local vault.

query.description: Search query to match against note titles and content.

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return.

operations.name: read-note
operations.description: Read the content of a note by its path relative to the vault root.

path.description: Relative path to the note within the vault (e.g. 'folder/note.md').

operations.name: create-note
operations.description: Create a new Markdown note with a title and content.

title.description: Title for the new note (used as filename).

content.description: Markdown content for the note body.

folder.description: Optional subfolder within the vault to create the note in.

operations.name: list-notes
operations.description: List notes in a directory or folder within the vault.

folder.description: Subfolder path relative to vault root. Omit or use empty string for vault root.

recursive.description: Whether to list notes in subdirectories recursively.
